## Quick Analysis Commands

```bash
# View latest performance report
cat doc/performance_report_*.json | jq '.summary'

# Check demo logs
tail -50 logs/demo_suite_*.log

# List generated files
find doc/ output/ debug/ -type f -name "*" | sort
```
